com.jme3.input.event

Class TouchEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.input.event.InputEvent
      • com.jme3.input.event.TouchEvent

  • public class TouchEvent
extends InputEvent
    TouchEvent represents a single event from multi-touch input devices
